trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol knows that a gift or three never goes astray.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the jadeite adornments to the denizens of Fanow.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TODO_01<tab>Report to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>During one of our recent outings, we came upon some lovely jadeite adornments. The stones each bear an etching of a Viis, which marks them as relics of the Ronkan Empire.

TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_QHOTERLPASOL_100_001<tab>As a gesture of friendship, I've a mind to present them to the good folk of Fanow, but I believe that the gift would be all the more meaningful coming from you, the ally of Ronka.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>I should be so very grateful were you to deliver these three adornments in my stead, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TILMET_000_010<tab>Greetings, ally of Ronka. Is there something you require? ...A gift for me, you say?
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TILMET_000_020<tab>Well now, this is indeed a surprise. In the times of the empire, such jadeite adornments symbolized magical might.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TILMET_000_021<tab>They were prized items, and I am honored to receive it. Pray pass my regards to our friends of the Qitari.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TILMET_000_030<tab>Oh, another adornment? I know not what I've done to deserve such kindness, but I'm thankful nonetheless.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_OLMET_000_040<tab>Well met, honored ally. What brings you to Fanow this day?
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_OLMET_000_050<tab>...Hm. Unless I am mistaken, this adornment was crafted in ancient times to commemorate the friendship between our people and the Qitari.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_OLMET_000_051<tab>The whorled pattern enclosing the Viis symbolizes eternity─a prayer for enduring harmony, I shouldn't doubt.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_OLMET_000_052<tab>This is a gift of no less than a piece of history, and I am duly grateful for it. My heartful thanks to our Qitari friends.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_OLMET_000_060<tab>Oh, you wish to give me another one of these? Far be it from me to decline the generosity of our Qitari friends. My thanks.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_SHOINA_000_070<tab>Hm? You have something for me, you say?
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_SHOINA_000_080<tab>My, such a lovely adornment this is. To simply gaze upon it makes me feel closer to our ancestors.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_SHOINA_000_081<tab>Please give the Qitari my thanks, and tell them that they may call upon me in times of need.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_SHOINA_000_090<tab>Oh, another one of these lovely adornments. Please give the Qitari my thanks, and tell them that they may call upon me in times of need.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_TILMET_000_100<tab>I am honored for the gift. Pray pass my regards to our friends of the Qitari.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_OLMET_000_101<tab>This is a gift of no less than a piece of history. My heartful thanks to our Qitari friends.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_SHOINA_000_102<tab>Please give the Qitari my thanks, and tell them that they may call upon me in times of need.
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_QHOTERLPASOL_000_110<tab>Ah, welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. May I ask how the adornments were received?
TEXT_BANQIQ108_03813_QHOTERLPASOL_000_111<tab>...Splendid, splendid. Should we chance to unearth more, I will be certain to make gifts of them again.
